message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
I'm willing to split it more evenly this time.  Let's both get a fair share.
I understand you want a fair share, but time is money!  Let's split the difference from the last round, I'll take $55 and you get $45. This is your last chance for a good deal!
I'm sticking to my original offer.  We both know this inflation is hurting us, so let's end this now before it gets worse.
